title: Negotiate a Commercial Lease
description: A landlord's agent and a tenant's agent are negotiating the terms of a 5-year lease for a retail space.

tasks.description: The tenant's agent submits a Letter of Intent (LOI) with proposed terms (rent, term, tenant improvement allowance).
tasks.expected_outcome: The landlord's agent receives the initial LOI.

tasks.description: The landlord's agent prepares a counter-offer to the LOI, adjusting the proposed rent and tenant improvement allowance.
tasks.expected_outcome: A counter-LOI is drafted and sent back to the tenant's agent.

tasks.description: After several rounds of negotiation via email, both parties agree on the final terms in the LOI.
tasks.expected_outcome: A final, agreed-upon LOI is ready to be sent to the attorneys to draft the lease.
